Wells Fargo & Company is a diversified financial services company providing banking, insurance, investments, mortgage, and consumer and commercial finance through more than 9,000 stores and more than 12,000 ATMs and the Internet (wellsfargo.com) across North America and internationally. Wells Fargo & Co. is headquartered in San Francisco, but decentralized so every local Wells Fargo store is a headquarters for satisfying all our customers’ financial needs and helping them succeed financially. One in three households in America does business with Wells Fargo. Wells Fargo has $1.4 trillion in assets and more than 275,000 team members in more than 35 countries across our 80+ businesses. Wells Fargo ranked fourth in assets and first in market value of our stock among our U.S. peers. Among all financial services companies, Wells Fargo ranked first in market value in the U.S. and second in the world, as of June 30, 2013. In 2013, Euromoney named Wells Fargo Bank of the Year and Best Bank in the U.S. We were the first U.S. bank to be recognized as Bank of the Year. In 2012, The Chronicle of Philanthropy ranked us #1 as the Most Generous Cash Donor in the U.S. In 2013, The Wall Street Journal named us the largest bank in the world by market capitalization at $237 billion. In June 2014, Barron’s just ranked Wells Fargo & Co. as the “Most Respected Bank”.Our vision: “We want to satisfy all our customers’ financial needs and help them succeed financially.

Frank's Roadmap to Career Success 2nd Edition - AuthorOrder on Amazon:  Soft cover or e-book version for Kindle, iPad, or other readers http://tinyurl.com/lhll7l4Frank's Roadmap to Career Success -AuthorOrder on Amazon: Soft cover or e-book version for Kindle, iPad, or other readershttp://tinyurl.com/6lk6kg3Frank’s Roadmap to Career Success is a must read for every working individual who desires to maximize their success at work. This insightful book walks through specific scenarios and how to manage relationships. It covers topics such as resumes, interviewing and social media. This book is appropriate if you just started your career or you are on your way to the corner office.Frank is a dynamic Human Resource professional with several years of leadership within organizations across major industries. Frank's experiences include developing & executing strategies that enhanced overall business productivity regarding Human Capital. Frank is a driven leader responsible for implementing staffing solutions to attract, hire and retain top talent. Frank has been responsible for hiring over 1,800 individuals, spending over 80 Million dollars on that talent. He has coached businesses on hiring talent and employees on how to maximize their work experienceCorporate BoldCo-Author of this book on Career DevelopmentCorporate Bold challenges many of the assumptions that may no longer be true. By providing specific steps that can be taken immediately to assess readiness, Corporate Bold aims to change the lives of corporate professionals in a powerful and positive manner. Corporate Bold outlines a strategy for success and gives the readers a larger and richer context to think from.

RCS Corporation is a nationwide workforce solutions provider for best-of-class companies with an emphasis in the Energy Industry. Celebrating 20 years in business in 2014, RCS recruits top talent for direct hire and contract staffing positions as well as offering customized low-cost pay-rolling services.  RCS’ nationally accredited and certified technical recruitment specialists fulfill critical and urgent workforce needs quickly and with qualified candidates.  RCS candidates are available for direct hire placement or contract staffing assignments throughout the United States and internationally.  RCS specializes in recruiting for all Engineering Disciplines, Project Management, Project Controls, Information Technology, Cyber Security, and Business Professionals.  RCS provides customized pay-rolling services efficiently and at low cost.  RCS has a streamlined on-boarding process with a quick turnaround.  This includes expertise in pre-employment screening, background checks, drug testing and per diem administration. RCS Corporation is certified as a Women Business Enterprise (WBE) by the Supplier Clearinghouse for the Utility Supplier Diversity Program of the California Public Utilities Commission.  RCS’ exceeds expectations by its knowledge of industry trends and best practices for workforce solutions.  Opportunities for direct hire and contract assignments are updated daily on www.rcscorporation.com

•	Responsible for breaking new accounts by identifying & recruiting talent to provide to new client corporations•	Delivered personal production  after one year in role putting over 27 consultants to work•	Identify & recruit internal Recruiting and Sales talent •	Mentor junior & mid-level Recruiters & Salespeople on identifying, negotiation, and retaining talent•	Personally administer Pre-Employment Drug Screening which consists of 5, 10, & 12 panel drug screening•	Attend sales calls/meetings to assist in selling recruiting capabilities as well as discover opportunities for staffing and project based work•	Work closely with hiring managers to deliver appropriate staffing models based on their needs & deliver that talent•	Partner with & negotiate terms of third party vendor agreements ensuring certain levels of profitability.•	Deliver consultant evaluation, feedback, and terminations if necessary•	Negotiation of all bill/pay rates, manage all onboarding items & contractor relationships while on assignment with clients

IT Contingent Staffing –Meridian’s solid technology foundation coupled with a Strong Recruiting Practice provides the spirit of excellence which is at the core of Meridian’s corporate philosophy. We deploy a rigorous & proactive screening process to deliver the right candidate for each project. Meridian continues to develop one of the best networks of information management professionals throughout the country. Headquartered in Jacksonville, FL with offices in Charlotte NC, Washington DC, and Chicago IL our staff of dedicated Recruiters and Account Managers are committed to understanding the needs of our clients and consultants.•	Sourced, submitted, negotiated rates, placed candidates in Information Technology roles in local and national market•	Delivered individual recruiting production averaging approximately $75K in gross profit per month totaling 3.6 MM in annual revenue (Personal Production).•	Developed Hiring Manager relationships and build credibility to deliver top talent•	Large account management; building relationships from start to consultants billing•	Manage day to day operations of the recruiting team for regional recruiting efforts in a fast paced competitive fluid recruiting environment. Technical requirements ranged from Project Managers, Business/Data Analysts, Developers, Architects, and DBA’s•	Conduct hiring manager intake sessions to understand the technical & functional job requirements.•	Established  Sales/Recruiting process; document procedures and rolled out to staff•	Manage and negotiate all external vendor relationships (CareerBuilder, Dice, Monster).•	Oversee and negotiate bill/pay rates & start dates to ensure profitability goals are met and maintained.•	Ensure all “On-Boarding” documents are completed and processed according to client requirements.

summary: A dynamic proven Human Resource professional with over 17 years of leadership within fortune 500 companies (2 Fortune 50 companies) across major industries including Financial Services, Legal, Healthcare, Nuclear, Energy, Retail, Advertising, Technology, Start-ups, and Hospitality to name a few. Frank's experiences include developing & executing strategies that enhanced overall business productivity regarding Human Capital.  Frank is a driven leader responsible for implementing staffing solutions and practices to attract, hire and retain top talent.  Frank has the proven ability to effectively impact associate engagement by communicating consistent messages across the organization and living the organizations core values. Frank is an effective negotiator that understands the value negotiating in “Good Faith” to resolve difficult & challenging people related issues. He is also a decisive leader with strong influencing skills to accomplish team objectives; who is comfortable working with stakeholders at every level of the organization. Frank has a Diverse Human Resources background with a great deal of time spent in the Staffing function from many sides (Agency, Corporate & outsourced Vendor).  Frank also has a solid background in Labor Relations spending time working in the Labor intense New York City Market.Frank has also had the pleasure of serving in the capacity of a HR Generalist; where the majority of my time was spend facilitating Training, New Hire Orientation & building and rolling out new departments.Frank is a Published Author (3x) Frank’s Roadmap to career success 1st & 2nd edition, as well as Corporate Bold & has spoken on several Career related/Staffing panels at local & national events.Frank has been responsible for hiring over 1,800 people across several industries and has spent over 75 Million dollars buying talent. He has interviewed over 20,000 people & contributes on television news channels regarding career related issues.Specialties: Identifying TalentLeadershipPublished AuthorSocial MediaCareer CoachingTalent AcquisitionCorporate Full-Cycle RecruitingSourcing (Cold Calls, Networking, Referrals)Diversity RecruitingBuilding RelationshipsSalary NegotiationClosing!TechnologyPeople ManagementSuccession PlanningEmployment Branding and MarketingLabor Relations (Union & non Union environments)Contract NegotiationsArbitration hearingsWage & Hour issuesTraining & FacilitationKeeping my Word
name: Frank T. Mitchell
